Title: Reform
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Rick Eid, Gwen Sigan (story editor), Kinan Copen (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: Intelligence attempts to bust a gun deal that results in innocent bystanders getting shot.
